item.title: Moxibustion for good health
item.description: Mugukboyangtm is composed of 8 kinds of acupuncture points. Including the both side of body, 12 points for men and 13 points for women.

item.title: Being Healthy!
item.description: Here is prerequisite for being healthy. In this 21st century, there are lots of things to keep in mind.

item.title: Better and Simple way to Physical Health(Western medicine vs Oriental medicine)
item.description: This site helps you have better and sustainable health using cheaper ways such as traditional Oriental medicine and diet & exercise which fit for your body type.
